meanings.definition: A mammal of the horse family, Equidae, with a braying call.
meanings.sent1: The wild ass ran across the field, making loud noises.
meanings.sent2: I saw an ass at the zoo today, and it sounded funny.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ass go to school? To improve its braying skills!
meanings.sent4: His laughter echoed through the room like the call of an ass.
meanings.sent5: The ass's cry pierced the silence of the night, startling everyone.

meanings.sent1: Don't be an ass and make silly mistakes.
meanings.sent2: He acted like a complete ass during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: Why did the silly ass bring a ladder to the bar? He heard the drinks were on the house!
meanings.sent4: Her ex-boyfriend proved to be a real ass, always causing trouble.
meanings.sent5: The class clown's antics made him the biggest ass in school.

meanings.sent1: She slipped on the wet floor and landed right on her ass.
meanings.sent2: He needs to do more squats to tone his ass.
meanings.sent3: Why did the peach blush? Because it saw the other fruits checking out its juicy ass!
meanings.sent4: The old chair creaked under the weight of his heavy ass.
meanings.sent5: The boxer's opponent landed a hard punch right on his ass, knocking him down.
